subs.text: @jim_enloe @ArmchairG3neral @OSpurdo @WarObserver14 @kms_d4k @dim0kq The one they were testing in early 2021 (with terminal p/n 00105950-501): Ku-band antenna (012987-501) Tx gain: 34.2 dBi Beamwidth: 3.5deg. (HPBW) Tx power: 3.2 W Tx ERP: 5.1 kW Tx EIRP: 39.1 dBW 14.125 & 14.375 GHz antenna patterns: [link]
subs.rawText:
@jim_enloe @ArmchairG3neral @OSpurdo @WarObserver14 @kms_d4k @dim0kq The one they were testing in early 2021 (with terminal p/n 00105950-501):

Ku-band antenna (012987-501)
 Tx gain: 34.2 dBi
 Beamwidth: 3.5deg. (HPBW)

 Tx power: 3.2 W
 Tx ERP: 5.1 kW
 Tx EIRP: 39.1 dBW

14.125 & 14.375 GHz antenna patterns:

https://t.co/AXP5PGj1z6

subs.text:
@Debkrol @aurabogado Risk:

Terminal > in seat while engines running

‚Ä¶ but ‚Ä¶

Boarding / unboarding > terminal > in seat while engines running

[_If_ shore ventilation is hooked up (those flexible yellow hoses from the JetWay) it‚Äôs still less effective than that provided by the engine bleed air.]
subs.rawText:
@Debkrol @aurabogado Risk:

Terminal > in seat while engines running

‚Ä¶ but ‚Ä¶

Boarding / unboarding > terminal > in seat while engines running

[_If_ shore ventilation is hooked up (those flexible yellow hoses from the JetWay) it‚Äôs still less effective than that provided by the engine bleed air.]
